verses.verse: And he said<WH559> unto me<WH1121>, Son of man<WH120>, eat<WH398> that which thou findest<WH4672>; eat<WH398> this roll<WH4039>, and go<WH3212>, speak<WH1696> unto the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>.
So I opened<WH6605> my mouth<WH6310>, and he caused me to eat<WH398> the roll<WH4039>.

And he said<WH559> unto me<WH1121>, Son of man<WH120>, cause thy belly<WH990> to eat<WH398>, and fill<WH4390> thy bowels<WH4578> with this roll<WH4039> that I give<WH5414> thee<WH398>. Then did I eat it<WH6310>; and it was in my mouth as honey<WH1706> for sweetness<WH4966>.
And he said<WH559> unto me<WH1121>, Son of man<WH120>, go<WH3212>, get<WH935> thee unto the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, and speak<WH1696> with my words unto them<WH1697>.
For thou art not sent<WH7971> to a people<WH5971> of a strange<WH6012> speech<WH8193> and of a hard<WH3515> language<WH3956>, but to the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>;

not to many<WH7227> peoples<WH5971> of a strange<WH6012> speech<WH8193> and of a hard<WH3515> language<WH3956>, whose words<WH1697> thou canst not understand<WH8085>. Surely<WH7971>, if I sent thee to them<WH8085>, they would hearken unto thee.

But the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> will<WH14> not hearken<WH8085> unto thee<WH14>; for they will not hearken<WH8085> unto me<WH1004>: for all the house of Israel<WH3478> are of hard forehead<WH2389> and of a stiff heart<WH7186>.
Behold <WH5414>, I have made thy face<WH6440> hard<WH2389> against<WH5980> their faces<WH6440>, and thy forehead<WH4696> hard<WH2389> against<WH5980> their foreheads<WH4696>.

As an adamant<WH8068> harder<WH2389> than flint<WH6864> have I made<WH5414> thy forehead<WH4696>: fear<WH3372> them not<WH2865>, neither be dismayed at their looks<WH6440>, though they are a rebellious<WH4805> house<WH1004>.
Moreover he said<WH559> unto me<WH1121>, Son of man<WH120>, all my words<WH1697> that I shall speak<WH1696> unto thee receive<WH3947> in thy heart<WH3824>, and hear<WH8085> with thine ears<WH241>.

And go<WH3212>, get<WH935> thee to them of the captivity<WH1473>, unto the children<WH1121> of thy people<WH5971>, and speak<WH1696> unto them<WH559>, and tell them<WH559>, Thus saith the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>; whether they will hear<WH8085>, or whether they will forbear<WH2308>.

Then the Spirit<WH7307> lifted me up<WH5375>, and I heard<WH8085> behind<WH310> me the voice<WH6963> of a great<WH1419> rushing<WH7494>, saying<WH1288>, Blessed be the glory<WH3519> of Jehovah<WH3068> from his place<WH4725>.

And I heard the noise<WH6963> of the wings<WH3671> of the living creatures<WH2416> as they touched<WH5401> one<WH802> another<WH269>, and the noise<WH6963> of the wheels<WH212> beside<WH5980> them<WH6963>, even the noise of a great<WH1419> rushing<WH7494>.

So the Spirit<WH7307> lifted me up<WH5375>, and took me away<WH3947>; and I went<WH3212> in bitterness<WH4751>, in the heat<WH2534> of my spirit<WH7307>; and the hand<WH3027> of Jehovah<WH3068> was strong upon me<WH2388>.

Then I came<WH935> to them of the captivity<WH1473> at Tel-abib<WH8512>, that dwelt<WH3427> by the river<WH5104> Chebar<WH3529>, and to where they dwelt<WH3427>; and I sat<WH3427> there<WH3427> overwhelmed<WH8074> among<WH8432> them seven<WH7651> days<WH3117>.
And it came to pass at the end<WH7097> of seven<WH7651> days<WH3117>, that the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> came unto me<WH559>, saying,

Son <WH1121> of man<WH120>, I have made<WH5414> thee a watchman<WH6822> unto the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>: therefore hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> at my mouth<WH6310>, and give them warning from me<WH2094>.

When I say<WH559> unto the wicked<WH7563>, Thou shalt surely<WH4191> die<WH4191>; and thou givest him not warning<WH2094>, nor speakest<WH1696> to warn<WH2094> the wicked<WH7563> from his wicked<WH7563> way<WH1870>, to save his life<WH2421>; the same wicked<WH7563> man shall die<WH4191> in his iniquity<WH5771>; but his blood<WH1818> will I require<WH1245> at thy hand<WH3027>.

Yet if thou warn<WH2094> the wicked<WH7563>, and he turn<WH7725> not from his wickedness<WH7562>, nor from his wicked<WH7563> way<WH1870>, he shall die<WH4191> in his iniquity<WH5771>; but thou hast delivered<WH5337> thy soul<WH5315>.

Again <WH7725>, when a righteous<WH6662> man doth turn<WH7725> from his righteousness<WH6664>, and commit<WH6213> iniquity<WH5766>, and I lay<WH5414> a stumblingblock<WH4383> before<WH6440> him<WH4191>, he shall die: because thou hast not given him warning<WH2094>, he shall die<WH4191> in his sin<WH2403>, and his righteous<WH6666> deeds which he hath done<WH6213> shall not be remembered<WH2142>; but his blood<WH1818> will I require<WH1245> at thy hand<WH3027>.

Nevertheless if thou warn<WH2094> the righteous<WH6662> man<WH6662>, that the righteous sin<WH2398> not<WH2398>, and he doth not sin, he shall surely<WH2421> live<WH2421>, because he took warning<WH2094>; and thou hast delivered<WH5337> thy soul<WH5315>.
And the hand<WH3027> of Jehovah<WH3068> was there upon me<WH559>; and he said unto me<WH6965>, Arise, go forth<WH3318> into the plain<WH1237>, and I will there talk with thee<WH1696>.

Then I arose<WH6965>, and went forth<WH3318> into the plain<WH1237>: and<WH3519>, behold, the glory of Jehovah<WH3068> stood<WH5975> there<WH3519>, as the glory which I saw<WH7200> by the river<WH5104> Chebar<WH3529>; and I fell<WH5307> on my face<WH6440>.

Then the Spirit<WH7307> entered<WH935> into me<WH5975>, and set me upon my feet<WH7272>; and he spake<WH1696> with me<WH559>, and said unto me<WH935>, Go, shut<WH5462> thyself within<WH8432> thy house<WH1004>.
But thou<WH1121>, son of man<WH120>, behold<WH5414>, they shall lay bands<WH5688> upon thee<WH631>, and shall bind thee with them<WH3318>, and thou shalt not go out among them<WH8432>:

and I will make thy tongue<WH3956> cleave<WH1692> to the roof of thy mouth<WH2441>, that thou shalt be dumb<WH481>, and shalt not be to them a reprover<WH376>; for they are a rebellious<WH4805> house<WH1004>.

But when I speak<WH1696> with<WH854> thee<WH6605>, I will open thy mouth<WH6310>, and thou shalt say<WH559> unto them<WH559>, Thus saith the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: He that heareth<WH8085>, let him hear<WH8085>; and he that forbeareth<WH2310>, let him forbear<WH2308>: for they are a rebellious<WH4805> house<WH1004>.
